name: Spectral Ninja
description:
You control a ninja capable of killing enemies through the spectral dimension.

Controls:

  • [A] [D] - Move left and right
  • [Space] Jump
  • [L] Rewind (four seconds)
  • [K] Dash (immune to damage)
  • [J] Attack
  • [J] [J] Double Attack
  • [W] Go through door

Instructions and help:

You must kill at least half of the enemies to open a door that leads to the next level. Rewinding will restore 50% of the health you lost during the last four seconds.

You do physical (normal) damage with your attacks. Your second attack and dash also do spectral damage (marked blue on the enemies' healthbar). Spectral damage can be triggered by rewinding.
